column1: #Text=Shaoxing ( 绍兴 ) is a city in Zhejiang , near Shanghai and Hangzhou , famous for its traditional Chinese bridges , boats , architectures , yellow wine and a huge number of textile and cloth factories and production .
#Text=The fastest way to get there is by plane , stop in Xiaoshan International Airport ( XIA ) , then take a bus or cab to get into downtown , no more than 20 km away from the airport .
#Text=The easiest way to get into Shaoxing is by bus , almost every city in Zhejiang will have transportation to Shaoxing .
#Text=The downtown is very clean , and very nice to walk around to feel the perfect combination of modern and ancient Chinese culture
#Text=Fishermen in this town used to use cormorants ( 鸬鹚 ) for fishing , but nowadays the town only has the birds on special occasions .
#Text=Call the travel association ahead of time to ask before coming here to look for birds .
#Text=Lu Xun 's Hometown Tourism Precinct ( 鲁迅故里景区 ) , 241 Luxun Zhong Lu , Yuecheng District , Shaoxing ( 绍兴市越城区鲁迅中路241号 ) .

column3: 绍兴市越城区鲁迅中路241号

column1: #Text=An assortment of buildings associated with Lu Xun , a famous early 20th century Chinese writer .
#Text=Shen 's Garden ( 沈园 ) , 318 Luxun Zhong Lu , Yuecheng District , Shaoxing ( 绍兴市越城区鲁迅中路318号 ) .

column3: 绍兴市越城区鲁迅中路318号

column1: #Text=Stone Buddha Grottoes peaks , one for the southern four stone Buddhas .
#Text=Buddha , 10 meters high , the left knee fall to be shaking hands with visitors , this attitude is rare in China .
#Text=Yangshan foot of the lake has Shifosi , Temple , surrounded by water on both sides of solitary backers .
#Text=There are many shopping malls in the downtown area , here recommended some :
#Text=Lotus - in the north west of the downtown , a Thai cooperation 's shopping center , offering variety of daily products with comprehensive prices .
#Text=Trust-Mart - in the middle of the downtown , right beneath the center square underground , easy transportation .
#Text=Buxing Road - in the south of the downtown , famous for its traditional Chinese small products like stamps , old money , pets and small hand made gifts .
#Text=Home Inn ShaoXing MoEr ( Inside Mole Modern town in the northern west downtown ) .
#Text=Shaoxing International Hotel , Fushan West Rd No.100 .
#Text=Shaoxing Native Place Youth Hostel ( 绍兴鲁迅故里国际青年旅舍 ) , 鲁迅故里内新建南路558号（鲁迅故里西大门口即咸亨酒店旁边） , ☏ +86 575-85080288 , ✉ sxluxunguli@163.com .

column3: 绍兴鲁迅故里国际青年旅舍
鲁迅故里内新建南路558号（鲁迅故里西大门口即咸亨酒店旁边）

column1: #Text=Decent youth hostel in a nice old building with a lovely courtyard .
#Text=Located a few minutes walk away from the Lu Xun attractions in a nice old street .
#Text=Qianqing ( 钱清 ) A small town not far away from downtown Shaoxing , bus 613 will get you there directly , and it is famous for its cheap textile and cloth materials with nice quality .
